snippet: A disastrous economy, static politics and a newly created opening in the border with Serbia have enticed tens of thousands of Kosovars to leave their troubled land.
abstract: Tens of thousands of Kosovo Albanians, most of whom are Muslims, are fleeing a ravaged economy and corrupt government, traveling through Serbia to newly opened border with Hungary and into countries of European Union; swift and intense exodus in search of jobs and a better life is not, however, being greeted warmly, and many are being forced back to Kosovo.
lead_paragraph: A disastrous economy, static politics and a newly created opening in the border with Serbia have enticed tens of thousands of Kosovars to leave their troubled land.

headline.main: Kosovars Who Fought for Land Are Now Eager to Leave
headline.print_headline: Kosovars Who Fought for Land Are Now Eager to Leave
